title: Star Wars actors Mark Hamill and Adam Driver join forces to help find a lost dog in Brussels
text:
Both the light and dark sides of the force have united to find a lost dog.

Mark Hamill -who plays iconic Star Wars hero Luke Skywalker- and Adam Driver -aka the villainous Kylo Ren in The Force Awakens- took to social media to spread the word that Javelot had run away from the set of a film Driver was making in Brussels.

Producer Charles Gillibert announced that the dog had been found safe and sound on Thursday morning.

Reunited! Mark Hamill and Adam Driver joined forces to help find lost dog Javelot [pictured] this week

'We found back #LeosCarax dog #Javelot !!! Thank you so much to everybody, especially to #AdamDriver, #MarkHamill and all the people who helped,' tweeted the producer..

He also tweeted a photo of Javelot wagging his tail happily while being patted.

The good news came after 35-year-old Girls actor Adam made an offer to give whomever found the errant pooch a role in his latest movie.

Offer: The good news came after 35-year-old Girls actor Adam made an offer to give whomever found the errant pooch a role in his latest movie

Saving the day: Adam's The Last Jedi co-star Hamill then signal-boosted the call for help

Driver was shooting the movie Annette alongside French actress Marion Cotillard when director Leos Carax's beloved dog ran off the set.

Adam then filmed a plea for help in the park in which Javelot was last seen.

'If you have seen him please give us a call,' he said.

Not so bad after all: Driver seen here portraying the villainous Kylo Ren in The Last Jedi

Found! Driver was shooting the movie Annette alongside French actress Marion Cotillard when director Leos Carax's beloved dog ran off the set

'We will put you in the movie, we will give you chocolate, we will christen your child — we’ll do anything as a way of saying thank you.'

Adam's The Last Jedi co-star Hamill then signal-boosted the call for help, tweeting '#AdamDriver is asking for help to find #Javelot - #LeosCarax’s dog! He is 9-yrs old & has been missing for over 24 hrs.'

No word yet on whether or not a member of the public scored themselves a role alongside Driver and Academy Award winner Marion in their film.
description: Mark Hamill -who plays iconic Star Wars hero Luke Skywalker- and Adam Driver -aka the villainous Kylo Ren in The Force Awakens- took to social media to help find a lost dog.
